name: UK / GB Landline & Mobile Phone Number Match
description: Matches UK/GB 10 or 11 digit Phone numbers. If spaces are used no match.Also includes +44 and 0044 recognition.Examples:WILL MATCHlandline: 02082990482mobile: 07700420030either {00447700420030} or {00447700420030}either {+447700420030} or {+447700420030}WONT MATCH:07700 420 030023654556456454656488
author: Chris K
